    AddressFormat { 
        PostalFormat { "%z%c%T%s%b%e%r" }
    }
    AmPmMarkers { 
            "AM",
            "PM",
    }
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: CountryISBNNumber */
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: CountryNumber */
    CurrencyElements { 
            "HK$",
            "HKD ",
            ".",
    }
    DateTimePatterns { 
            "aahh:mm:ss z",
            "hh:mm:ss z",
            "hh:mm:ss z",
            "hh:mm:ss z",
            "EEEE, MMMM dd, yyyy aa",
            "EEEE, MMMM dd, yyyy aahh:mm:ss z",
            "EEEE, MMMM dd, yyyy",
            "EEEE, MMMM dd, yyyy",
            "{1} {0}",
    }
    DayAbbreviations { 
            "Sun",
            "Mon",
            "Tue",
            "Wed",
            "Thu",
            "Fri",
            "Sat",
    }
    DayNames { 
            "Sunday",
            "Monday",
            "Tuesday",
            "Wednesday",
            "Thursday",
            "Friday",
            "Saturday",
    }
    Identification { 
        Title { "English locale for Hong Kong" }
        Source { "IBM Globalization Center of Competency, Yamato Software Laboratory" }
        Address { "1623-14, Shimotsuruma, Yamato-shi, Kanagawa-ken, 242-8502, Japan" }
        Contact { "" }

        Telephone { "" }
        Fax { "" }
        Language { "English" }
        Territory { "Hong Kong" }
        Audience { "" }
        Application { "" }
        Abbreviation { "" }
        Revision { "1.0" }
        Date { "2000,October,27 (XML source:2000,July,20)" }
    }
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: LanguageLibraryUse */
    Measurement { "Metric" }
    Messages { 
        YesExpression { "^[yY]" }
        NoExpression { "^[nN]" }
        YesStr { "Yes" }
        NoStr { "No" }
    }
    MonthAbbreviations { 
            "Jan",
            "Feb",
            "Mar",
            "Apr",
            "May",
            "Jun",
            "Jul",
            "Aug",
            "Sep",
            "Oct",

            "October",
            "November",
            "December",

    NameFormat { 
        NamePattern { "%p%t%g%t%m%t%f" }
        GeneralSalutaion { "" }
        ShortSalutationMr { "Mr." }
        ShortSalutationMiss { "Ms." }
        ShortSalutationMrs { "Mrs." }
        LongSalutationMr { "" }
        LongSalutationMiss { "" }
        LongSalutationMrs { "" }
    }
    NumberElements { 
            ".",
            ",",
            ";",
            "%",
            "0",
            "#",
            "-",
            "E",
            "\u2030",
            "\u221E",
            "\uFFFD",
    }
    NumberPatterns { 
            "#,##0.###;-#,##0.###",

            "#,##0%",
    }
    PaperSize { 
        Hieght { "297" }
        Width { "210" }
        Units { "mm" }
    }
